EmailTemplate.name: Unable to assist (English)
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont-request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr./Ms. {!Lead.LastName}, Thank you for your recent enquiry.
We have reviewed it and unfortunately we are unable to assist you at this time.
We appreciate your interest in DuPont, and hope that you will contact us in the future if you have a need for our products and services.
Best regards,
DuPont Product Information Service EMEA Toll-free number : 00800 3876 68 38 Phone : 0034 985 12 3773 Fax : 0034 912 72 52 37 E-mail: eu-info@dupont.com
